recipe.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipe.ingredients: Spaghetti, Ground beef, Tomato sauce, Onions,
recipe.steps: Boil the spaghetti according to the package instructions. Cook the ground beef in a pan until browned. Add tomato sauce and onions, and simmer for 15 minutes. Serve the sauce over the spaghetti.

recipe.name: Chicken Curry
recipe.ingredients: Chicken breast, Curry powder, Coconut milk, Rice,
recipe.steps: Cook the chicken breast in a pan until browned. Stir in the curry powder and cook for 1 minute. Add coconut milk and simmer for 20 minutes. Serve with rice.
